# sapiens

𒍪 zu ≈ 𒇴 ešēbu uššubu 𓋴 𓃀 𓇼 𓄿 𓀜 𓋴 𓃀 𓇼 𓄿 𓀜 “teaching, learning” ⲥⲁⲃⲟ ⲥⲃⲱ ‘learn’ ⇔ 𓋴 𓂋 𓐍 𓏜
𓋴𓐟𓄿𓇋𓋷𓀁 sapiens sophie
𓋴 𓍑 𓀁 | adviser ? | sophist sophie ⇔ spect 𓍑 pyro inspire

𓋴 𓊪 𓂧 𓅱 𓇮 | "the perceptive" | sapiens "Spitze" (elite)

𓋴 𓃀 𓀁 𓈖 𓎡 | •causal form of

𓃀 𓀁 𓈖 𓎡 𓏮 𓀁 | think | pense bedenken 𐌸𐌰𐌲𐌺𐌾𐌰𐌽

𓐟 gnostic 𓊌 gneiss

𓐍 𓈖 𓏏 𓅯 𓂻 | alighting | Grunden ( Landung )
𓐍 𓈖 𓏏 𓂉 | council-chamber | ⇔ Kontor 𓐍 𓈖 𓏏 𓉐 household ⇔ grand good s

𒄿 𒄀𒃲𒇻 ˢi-gi-gal-lu •sage-gallius √ groß
𒄿𒄀𒃲𒇻 ˢi-gi saigho => sough σοφός sophie sapiens
𒄿𒄀𒃲𒇻 wisdom, wise man

𓋴 𓐟 𓄿 𓇋 𓋷 𓀁 Zaya / zaba / manya “know” @ Bantu
